website_summaries.verdict: Roomy and comfortable for a group of 4 to lounge in, with extended flooring to maximize use.
pros: A very roomy sun shelter that will easily hold 4 adult size camp chairs
Floor extends out past the shelter so users can stretch their legs out without getting sand, mud, or grass on them
Support poles snap into place using the drawstring method, making setup almost instant
Protects very well against sun and wind
cons: The interior windows shades don’t stay rolled up, and the tent is difficult to pack away

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST perfect...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sun shade. It really is. I wanted to give it 5 stars, very badly. But I need to dock it by 1 star because it's very difficult to pack! Unpacking is very, very easy, no problem. But as for packing it up, not so. I've tried leaving the tent unzipped, I've tried it zipped, but it hardly makes a difference because the material gets lumpy in some areas so much that closing the case is extremely difficult, to the point where the seams look like they are about to burst! Makes me worry about its longevity, considering its high price tag.
customer_reviews.author: R. Z. B.

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARS
customer_reviews.text: I finally had a chance to setup the tent at the beach. It was very easy to set up, spacious, sturdy, and light weight. My wife and I loved the ability to zip up the front of the tent to change in. We are so happy with our purchase and the size of the tent.
customer_reviews.author: MRyan

customer_reviews.title: My husband touts this as his favorite amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: My husband touts this as his favorite amazon purchase. It is pretty neat. Super easy, roomy. Withstood 35 mph winds at our beach day--we wouldn't have been able to stay with out it. Did the suggestion of bringing gallon size bags for the pockets that let you weigh it down. I have not been successful at wrapping it back up collapsed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup/takedown, very small.
customer_reviews.text: This is not as large as I expected. I was thinking we could change clothing in it and fit 3 people. However, 2 standard folding chairs (director or camp style) barely fit. It’s much smaller than it looks. But, it works amazing well. Setup is literally only minutes and takedown is faster. Although, there is a learning curve the first time. The sand pockets work perfectly to keep wind from blowing the tent. Overall I couldn’t be happier with the ease of use, color and features. I just wish there was a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good shelter, but marginal for sun protection.
customer_reviews.text: It set up quickly and easily. However, it allows too much sunlight through it. We had to put our beach towels on top to get adequate shade. I would have gladly paid for the heavier one if I had known this would be an issue. Beyond that, it sets up in a minute or two with a little practice. Taking it down is also easy, but not repacking it in its cover while still at the beach. That’s not a big issue since I left it unpacked in the back of my van so that I could clean and repack it once I got home.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, arrived teared and too hot inside to use on the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use on the beach for my eight month old son. We used it for a half hour until it became BLISTERING hot inside. Fortunately, the people next to us at the beach had a baby as well and let us use their tent for that afternoon. We bought another tent to use at our beach house for our son that same evening. This one is basically dangerous for a child because the inside becomes boiling hot. Waste of money. Terrible product.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW - Strap broke on first use, but seller replaced
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I contacted the seller and they sent a new case very quickly. I haven't used it yet, but will provide another update when I do to communicate if this case is any better than the original. ORIGINAL: I'm really disappointed in this product as the carry strap broke the very first time I used it. I've contacted the seller and asked for a replacement carry case, so we'll see what happens.
customer_reviews.author: slavid

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: This sun shade is very spacious and easy to set up. I'm a little over 6'4" and I was able to layout with plenty of space for wife, kid, bags and cooler. We plan to use this a lot. I wish that the floor was removable so that we could play in the sand under the cover of the tent. Some reviews say that it held up well during high winds. Ours did not blow away or break but it sure did flex a lot, like almost horizontal to the ground. Overall love the product and glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with several broken pieces...
customer_reviews.text: Box was undamaged but the sunshade was all busted up. We noticed several broken pieces before we even got it laid out. Appears that the sunshade was damaged before it was even packed to send out. Immediately packed up to send back so no pics. Waiting anxiously for our replacement and hoping it arrives before our beach trip in a few weeks ...
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Weir

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Design
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an outdoor shade that we could easily bring to the beach or park with us. This packs up small, is light weight and easy to carry. The beach tent provides great shade while allowing air in, keeping it cool. The material seems very sturdy and the setup process is very simple. Breaking it down wasn’t quite as easy as setup but still very easy once we got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Hebard's Travels

customer_reviews.title: great for fishing ballgames
customer_reviews.text: bought for my son/grandkids for fishing, ball games, or whatever else they decide to use it for. purchased a different product 2 yr ago but no longer available so did research and found this one. big enough for the family to use regular chairs. some shelters are pretty low and meant for the beach chairs so I was careful in finding the right size. its still an early purchase so hope they get lots of use from it. easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally practical and easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, spacious, practical, easy to assemble. Our family loved it. Great for kids, pets, and yourself. We enjoyed a nice nap next to the ocean waves and it was super comfortable. It has compartments for you to put your phones, rings, charger, whatever you need to store Away. It also has a hook for you to hang whatever you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke the second time we opened it
customer_reviews.text: It broke the 2nd time we used it so frustrated it only worked once. Also the window flaps just loop in so you'll get a lot of wind through no matter what
customer_reviews.author: Nick Waggood

customer_reviews.title: Sending Mine Back
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this product and I am returning it. I took it to a park today to get a feel for setting it up. It definitely needs two people to set up and it's difficult to take down even with two people. My biggest problem is that the shelter only partially filters sunlight and does not, as near as I can tell, have any UV protection. I was also disappointed with the quality of construction. Seeing the actual product makes it seem expensive for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rob N

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Loved: how easy it was to setup, how roomy it ease and how well it protected us from the sun...in the picture I am 5’9 and could can see there is a lot of space left. Liked less: the carry bag could be a bit more sturdy (it ripped after 2 weeks - have to admit we checked it in on the plane, carried it to the beach 10 days in a row but still...)
customer_reviews.author: maline

customer_reviews.title: Would not disassemble without breaking.
customer_reviews.text: Item worked good the first day we used it on the beach... until taking back down at the end of the day. I had already practiced putting it up and taking down with ease several times at home. However, item would not disassemble correctly and broke. Now it’s too big to repackage and send back due to how it’s broken.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ballpark mom life changer!!
customer_reviews.text: We are a Ballpark family all summer long and this product is a game changer. Love the convenience of set up annnnnnd year down. I’ve used it 3 times already this season and it’s withheld wind and also protected the little one from the sun. It was also warmer on the inside for those Michigan sunny but cold 55 degree days. I’m 5’9” with a crawling baby and was able to set it up within 3 minutes max.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it nothing bad to day
customer_reviews.text: You will need the anchors in addition to the sand bags on the beach, it’s light weight making it great for carrying but light enough to blow away also- awesome tent for camping and beach. Just use anchors either way. Love it! Would but again. Easy easy easy to assemble. Two steps. Take out for of bag and spread out and then pull ropes for an easy and quick assembly. Look up on YouTube for video.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Oh My Gosh the easiest equipment to set up!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 5 minutes to set up. Before we got the product my husband and I looked at the videos (Thank You it helped a lot.) on how to set it up. It took longer to take it out of the box than it did to set it up. The breakdown so easy less that 5 min. We have not taken it to the beach yet so image it will take a little more time to tidy up before packing it up. Watch the video helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: A sport mom’s delight
customer_reviews.text: We brought this shelter to have at softball tournaments. Mostly for petite me to set up and take down . Easy to set up after you figure it out how to pull the cords. The whole 10U softball team was under it at one point. Quite roomy.
customer_reviews.author: a_texan_mama

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love the large size, gives plenty of room. The large vented windows help with ventilation. I also love the velcro sandbag pockets that help keep the tent in place along with spikes. The zipper front allows for privacy. I only used it once so far but I'm loving it. Easy set up and breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and take down, and very spacious
customer_reviews.text: We've used this tent once so far at the park, and though it was a little windy, we really didn't need the tie downs, the pegs were enough to keep it in place. It was big enough for my son, husband and myself and all of our stuff, and provided a much needed shade from the hot sun! The only problem was that the flap in the front gets really hot if it's sunny out! And the material is also not very comfortable on bare skin, even when cool, so I suggest also buying a large beach blanket for the floor. Otherwise, I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: After reading a number of reviews, I purchased this in the Spring of 2019 expecting an easy to use, relatively durable product. Despite reading the instructions a couple of times, it is flimsy and broke the first time I attempted to use it for a Labor Day beach trip. I was extremely disappointed that I no longer had an option to return it or at the very least have a replacement sent. The company customer service group responded to my original review and provided a replacement that was the next version and an upgrade. The new product is outstanding and totally made up for the initial problems experienced in 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Schuster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up doesn't say enough about this product. It comes together even on a windy beach. Roomy and provides ample shade for two people. Plenty of room for a cooler and other beach junk essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Milan Mrvichin

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it on the beach yet however, we set it up and it was very simple. It's lightweight and will hold at least 4 adults in chairs.
customer_reviews.author: jestamkr

customer_reviews.title: Bulky, bad in wind, sandy, should have gotten a big umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: I am laying down inside this shade structure at Coronado beach in San Diego after a bike ride down Silverstrand. The shade structure is bent over to the ground, sand is flying all over inside and the window coverings are whipping around and hitting me in the face. Damn heavy and bulky too. The shade is nice though. - and they gave me a refund very quickly, thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Widmann

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room, sets up easy.
customer_reviews.text: Went up easy and plenty of room for wife and i. The first time you set it up go slow and pay attention to how it all unfolds and snaps together. Easily blowen around in the wind but all beach cabanas are, get some screw anchors and you will be all set.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Big and perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is so much bigger than I thought it would be. This is awesome. It will be perfect for 3 people and all of stuff too. I can’t wait to get out to the lake and put it to use
customer_reviews.author: Chris cross

customer_reviews.title: Hot As Hell
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up. My husband and I love to be at the lake but not with this. We took it out and we were miserable. Didn't reflect the heat of the sun. Thank goodness we had a little fan. This a no for me and will have to purchase a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: R G

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 4 because the stakes it came with were not sturdy. We just bought some metal ones. Love how easy it was to set up!!
customer_reviews.author: Malinda Imel

customer_reviews.title: Great Bang for your Buck!
customer_reviews.text: Less than 2 minutes to set up, and took me 3 minutes to take down. I love the velcro sandbags which makes for easy dumping of sand. I would prefer a bit more support claspa to sturdy the back but I am very happy with my purchase. Can wait to see if it can hold up to the wind on the beach. It's enough for 2 adults 2 small kids and medium cooler and lots of necessities towels etc
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The only tough part is taking it down and trying to pack up. I don't think you'll get it back in the bag it came with but I just carried it 1/2 way broken down.. very nice once set up on the beach though. Nice privacy, great window placement and you can zip all the way up to make into private room if you need to change.
customer_reviews.author: Saverio DiGioia

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight and easy to put up and take down
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to put up and take down. We have 5 ppl in our family and we are squished to fit in with chairs but it would be perfect for a family of 4 I believe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Love our new tent!! Annah does too!! Big enough for us all and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Gods Own

customer_reviews.title: a bit difficult for a one person set up
customer_reviews.text: hard to set up with 1 person. I wish the 3 vent flaps would zip rather than just hang loose in order to repel rain just in case.. several loose threads on zippers. tent frame bars will not hold their straight position to make it easier to pop up. nice looking tent but didn't think it was worth $100. don't like to give bad reports but that is what I feel about this pop up.
customer_reviews.author: White Bear

customer_reviews.title: Better than a beach umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: More than pleasantly surprised. Was more roomier than expected. Set up was super easy and quick too. The family really enjoys it as well to use as a small changing room.
customer_reviews.author: B Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I used this at the beach on a very windy day and it held up wonderfully. It is very easy to setup if you follow the instructions (which are permeantly attached to the carrying bag). The beige blocks the suns rays but does allow quite a bit of light through. The blue would probably be a better option if you are wanting it to be more shaded and not just block the UV rays.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe’

customer_reviews.title: Good Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, I watched a youtube video and try it at home before take it to the beach, once at the beach I install it in 3 min, 4 people may fit comfortably, the tent proyect good shadow and the windows allow the airflow pass freely to keep it fresh!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used...but damaged.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. It was admittedly ‘used’ but came with a torn “band”. This was not indicated on the description.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: very dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift my husband bought in Nov for our trip in March and the tent couldn't be set up due to a faulty arm/ cog and to boot we can't return because we are out of the 6 months limit
customer_reviews.author: dmlupnorth

customer_reviews.title: This one has the most room and can be set up by 1 person and has enough room for 5kids and me me
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before I bought this and I love it. Used it on adventure days with my grandkids at the splash park. We had shade and my oldest used it to change in. Then used it for birthday sleepover. Dressed it up with twinkle lights scarves and every blanket and pillow in the house (inside the living room). I believe it will be a annual part of birthdays form now on! Love it
customer_reviews.author: memetracey

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Pure garbage. Set it up the first time & some wind caught it right when it opened and snapped a lot of peices, making it completely useless. The plastic is so cheap and destined to break at so many points due to the design. There’s a reason why you can’t return it after 30 days. They know. Jerks.
customer_reviews.author: BiG T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect the first time
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup the first time. Getting it repackaged anywhere close to its original small and neat bundle is impossible. Also the spines separate form the top every time you are setting up or taking down. So it is great when it works. When it broke the manufacturer did send me a replacement no questions asked, so if you are on the fence give it a gamble since they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's roomy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. At first it was difficult to get it to open, but I realized I need to eat more Wheaties. After I got it up I was surprised at all the room inside. If its hard to get up initially, step back, take a deep breath, and try again.
customer_reviews.author: Playaroo

customer_reviews.title: Never used successfully-don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We attempted to put this tent together the first day of vacation and a key piece snapped almost immediately rendering the tent useless. We had high hopes for this tent and had bought it to protect our infant son at the beach. We ended up replacing it with a cheap tent from a nearby drugstore that has done a better job. Complete waste of money since we’re two days outside of the return window. We will not be purchasing from this brand again. NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine L Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: No more sunburns
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little tent, fast assembly easy to use, on super hot days extremely useful shelter.
customer_reviews.author: elijah

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is best so far
customer_reviews.text: Okay first off let me say this is American made.. also when I receive my tentI didn't open it right away in 4 months later I go to open it and two of the poles were disconnected . I emailed them due to not being able to call from Corona, and they took care of me right away
customer_reviews.author: jroc

customer_reviews.title: falls apart easily, bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: First tent I received the strap of the carrying bag broke one me. Then this tent came came apart after only using it maybe 4 times. Always handled it with care and still a piece of it came off which makes it unusable. Safe to say these aren't the best quality tents. Customer service doesn't respond.
customer_reviews.author: Thibault Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, hard to set up in ANY wind
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad item but if you want to use on the beach or anywhere there is some wind you better have help. Even then, it blows around and wants to take off and fold in half. I’m returning mine. The stakes aren’t long enough to use in sand either.
customer_reviews.author: Corey R.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit two adults in reclining chairs, one in a regular chair, and a cooler quite easily. On windy days one should keep the windows open or it will become a kite.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great shade and easy to erect!
customer_reviews.text: This has probably the easiest assembly of any pop-up shelter I’ve ever used. Practice once at home and you’ll be putting it up easily in a couple of minutes at the beach
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Easy up & Down!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with this tent/shelter. Easy up & down and is perfect for the beach. He’s ready to buy another one for when we go with the kids
customer_reviews.author: Makeup n More

customer_reviews.title: Great buy 😁 helped us on our beach trip
customer_reviews.text: Great product would recommend , it's easy to set up and great quality.You can easily fit three low back beach chairs in this large instead shader.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome awesome and oh by the way, freaking awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love it , use it when we go to the beach or lake. Easy to set up and take down. Definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Robert Benthal

customer_reviews.title: Nice, one of the best for this price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good and strong Big enough for 2 adults and 2 kids I experienced a crazy rain and wind , it handled it well
customer_reviews.author: Emre D

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and plenty of room. We used it for a music festival and a thunder shower came up but we were able to huddle in the tent and stay dry. The only slight negative is the bag is a little small and its hard to stuff the tent in the bag after folding it up.
customer_reviews.author: SCClay

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Held up in hours of heavy winds and a sand blast at the beach. Very impressed! Roomy. after watching several you tube videos on how to assemble and dismantle, I tried it at home and looked like a pro. my brother was impressed that I did not need help! Ha! It is really easy to do though. Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: simonew

customer_reviews.title: This thing was perfect at the beach
customer_reviews.text: This thing was perfect at the beach. Provided plenty of shade for my family of 4. Popped up super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Love the sand pockets
customer_reviews.text: This worked as expected.Love the sand pockets. Easy up and easy down. Gave my wife and I a little privacy and shade on beach.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Helms

customer_reviews.title: One leg was found broken upon opening
customer_reviews.text: The produxt was found broken when I unpacked the package, and I should say that it is really a pitty to receive a damaged one. If you spend twice of the price you could even get a 3-person North Face tent with better quality and even smaller in size and lighter in weight. Hope this could be better next time.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this tent so much! This was my first time setting up a tent and it was easy on the first try. Lightweight, provides good shade and durable. Can’t wait to really use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lidia Elisa Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I thought but strong enough to stand up ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but strong enough to stand up to the island breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Morris

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love it but wish I had gotten the blue one. Sun is still bright inside. Put towels on top to block sun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved!!
customer_reviews.text: Huge amount of room for family. Easy to put up and take down. Worked very well on windy beach outing!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Perry

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and very happy we purchased it
customer_reviews.text: Great size and kids just love it, we use it for shade, set up in seconds. We used it weekly all summer and plan on taking it with on some upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: Tom J

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We got this for beach use. We wanted to rest it out so I opened it in our front yard. Set up was beyond easy and I’m 5’1.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: tent is fine but..
customer_reviews.text: Tent is fine, but doesnt have the hook on the ceiling center like it does in the picture. Was looking forward to hanging my fan there.. Everything else is fine.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the tent
customer_reviews.text: I thought tent was a little hard to set up and especially pack away but love it and would buy it again. Excellent sun protection for my family of 4.
customer_reviews.author: Lori V.

customer_reviews.title: I opened it immediately to see how easy it would be to get this up on the ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our upcoming beach trip! I opened it immediately to see how easy it would be to get this up on the beach. Took me about 5 minutes to get it up and back down and back in the bag. I am 5 feet tall so pulling the ropes from behind is a little challenging, but doable!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Drury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This came with a hole in it. Hard to fold up. Sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: laura Turner

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: the quality is very bad. The fabric is very transparent and does not protect anything from the sun, making being under it becomes unbearable due to the heat. I do not recommend it at all. it's better to be out of it than inside
customer_reviews.author: vanessa s kraemer

customer_reviews.title: great tent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up on the beach and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love my tent. It is easy to set up. I live by the beach and take it every time I go.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great beach tent
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up and take down! Took it to the beach everyday for a week and it was never a chore.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but then disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first few times but now it take 4 people to get it up. The legs are catching now and won’t just pop up
customer_reviews.author: Honest review

customer_reviews.title: Difficulties to set up with one person
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to put up and fold back up for one person.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: I loved how easy this was to set up and how roomy it was. The sand bag compartments were very nice since I set it up on Galveston's windy beach. The company is great and I highly recommend buying from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up But...
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is way to thin, provides no release form the blistering Texas sun.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great service!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent! We use it for swim meets and the beach. It is quick to setup and take down without using slide through poles. It takes about 2 minutes to setup or take down. Excellent customer service.!
customer_reviews.author: Batchman

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to the shore for our family vacation and it was perfect! Lightweight, easy to set up and roomy. This was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE BURROUGHS

customer_reviews.title: Liked it at first...then it broke.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this tent at first and I must admit setting up was not difficult and breaking down just as easy. But it broke on the third use. The front arms that hold it up at the opening just snapped off without any force so we could no longer use it. Sad day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was easy to set up and take down
customer_reviews.text: was easy to set up and take down. The bag should be larger and stronger. After two uses there are couple of spots where stitching is coming apart and now holes.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Sattler

customer_reviews.title: A must have for family beach days
customer_reviews.text: The portability and ease of use make this an item that is always brought to the beach. Those around us always look on in envy from the size and function this has.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Van Alstyne

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the second set up.
customer_reviews.text: It was amazing the one time I got to use it. The second time I tried to put it up, the posts snapped. It’s completely useless now.
customer_reviews.author: Toshia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install & packing...love it!!! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: AmErOiGan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Case
customer_reviews.text: it is great and east use! very spacious. disappointed in the carrying case, the strap ripped and broke just while carrying it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after one use. It was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: michele tama

customer_reviews.title: Not a tent.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good beach shade but not a tent. When zipped up it’s only big enough for at most two people.
customer_reviews.author: CJ L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty good shading. But it’s durability shall be verified. The bottom fabric seems to be weak.
customer_reviews.author: JG Kim

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: My joints on the tent broke the first time being assembled
customer_reviews.author: MacJ92

customer_reviews.title: GreT Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our dog. She loved it. See it coming in handy for several other uses.
customer_reviews.author: John/June

customer_reviews.title: It brakes
customer_reviews.text: A pole broke after 3 uses. It sets up as easy as they say but its fragile. I want a replacement
customer_reviews.author: anthony harper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We used it at the beach. Perfect shelter for some shade.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen G

customer_reviews.title: gooooooooood!
customer_reviews.text: Easy and convenient. I was very satisfied when I went on a picnic. It is easy to use by a woman alone.
customer_reviews.author: koJaein

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to setup and good
customer_reviews.text: Use it in Qatar. Very easy to setup and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Mario Schouten

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Waste of money, broke the first day with a little wind. Flaps don't even hold down when wind picks up. Bummed as a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JXC

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I am unhappy with this purchase because I cannot fit it back into its carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Richman

product_meta.title: Easthills Outdoors Instant Shader Deluxe XL Easy Up 4 Person Beach Tent Sun Shelter - Extended Zippered Porch Included
feature_bullets: EXTRA LARGE. The Instant Shade Deluxe XL is one of the biggest sun shelters for your whole family. 99" W x 53" D x 57" H plus a 53" front porch of space for up to 4 adults and children or pets. Weighs only 8 pounds and packs down to 41" x 8.5" x 8.5" for easy carrying and storage - easy to fit in the trunk of a car

1 MINTUE (OR LESS!) SETUP TIME and EASY TO USE. Setting up this tent couldn't be any faster or easier! In case you can't figure it out, we've sewed step-by-step instructions inside the carry bag; It also has three-sided roll up windows for 360 degree views and efficient ventilation to prevent hot tent; 4 internal mesh pockets to store your personal items

ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT and WATER RESISTANT. Crafted from 185T polyester coated with UPF 50+ protection that blocks 97.5% of harmful UV sun rays, providing all-day protection for your family on the beach or sports events.

ZIPPERED FRONT FOR ADDED PRIVACY. The easy to close front of the tent can come in handy when needing to change out of swimming suits, breastfeeding, or any other private moment. When you need extra privacy, or are away from the tent, the extended zippered front porch can be used as a front door and closed from both inside and outside

Includes 1 beach tent, 1 carry bag with shoulder strap, 10 plastic stakes, 4 guylines and 1 storage pouch; Customer friendly 1-year warranty; if you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us though Amazon. We'll always happy to help within 24 hours
